name: 祈風 Inorikaze
description:
■ About This Game ■
Inorikaze is a Touhou doujin game focus with the theme of pursuing the faith and bond. The main story is about Moriya family when they left Suwa and moved into Gensokyo, the Fantasy Village, and overcome the war between them and Tengus. And how they finally succeeded in gaining the faith with deeper relationships with each other.


■ Game Information ■
．Name: 祈風 Inorikaze
．Genre: AVG
．Franchise: Touhou 東方
．Language and Ratings: Traditional Chinese. All-aged contents.
．Game Length: 9 to 12 hours
．Screen Resolution: 1280 x 720

■ Key Features ■
．More than 20 characters from the original Touhou series in the story.
．Beautiful in-game screen and heart-touching stories.
．Blood-heated battle scene narrations!
．7 routes leading to different endings.


Touhou Project Creator: ZUN (Team Shanghai Alice)
Developer: Twilight, Astrolabe Draft
This game follows guidelines with Touhou Project Steam publication regulations.
